com.tozny.e3db

Interface AuthorizerPolicy


  • public interface AuthorizerPolicy
    Used for two purposes:
    • When returned by Client.getAuthorizedBy(ResultHandler), represents a writer that authorized this client to share on its behalf.
    • When returned by Client.getAuthorizers(ResultHandler), represents another client that this client has authorized to share on its behalf.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UUID authorizedBy()
      ID of the client that added the authorization.
      UUID authorizerId()
      ID of the authorizer that can share on the writer's behalf.
      String recordType()
      Record type that can be shared.
      UUID userId()
      ID of the user associated with the records.
      UUID writerId()
      ID of the writer producing the records.
